R

RAMatcherChain - Interface in net.edudb.relational_algebra
An interface, that implements the Chain of Responsibility design pattern, that is used to match relational algebra formulae.
RAMatcherResult - Class in net.edudb.relational_algebra
Holds a query tree node and the remaining string from the relational algebra formula.
